items.sentence: Tom and Mary were in the same class in junior high school.
I can\'t believe it\'s already been a year since Tom left.
What kinds of weapons did the police find in Tom\'s house?
What\'s important now is that you listen to what Tom says.
Are you planning on going to Boston with Tom next weekend?
Are you seriously thinking about giving Tom your computer?
Why did we have to come on this tour? It\'s really boring.
I don\'t ever want to be as irritating as Tom seems to be.
I don\'t think that we\'ll ever know what happened to Tom.
Whenever I hear that song, I think about when I was young.
